## FreeMovementControlsProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [FreeMovementControls](./controls.freemovementcontrols.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FreeMovementControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [domElement?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.domelement.md) | HTMLElement | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [keyboardDampFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.keyboarddampfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Damping factor between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [keyboardScaleFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.keyboardscalefactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for keyboard translation. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [panDegreeFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.pandegreefactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for panning. Defaults to Math.PI / 4 |
|  [pointerDampFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.pointerdampfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Damping factor between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.3 |
|  [pointerScaleFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.pointerscalefactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for two-pointer translation. Defaults to 4 |
|  [tiltDegreeFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.tiltdegreefactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for tilting. Defaults to Math.PI / 10 |
|  [wheelDampFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.wheeldampfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Damping factor between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.25 |
|  [wheelScaleFactor?](./controls.freemovementcontrolsprops.wheelscalefactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for wheel translation. Defaults to 0.05 |
